availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Evans Arthur (Covington, Kentucky, Commonwealth attorney & attorney)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, commonwealth attorney. Cincinnati, Ohio, native. Son of William Arthur and Eliza Parsons Arthur. Studied law under John White Stevenson and James T. Morehead. Admitted to the bar in 1850. Married to Adeliza Southgate Arthur in 1855. Attorney in Covington in 1860. Married to Ethalinda Southgate Arthur in 1861. Commonwealth attorney for the Ninth Judicial District from 1856 to 1861.

ab.bibl: Paul L. Whalen, "Arthur, William Evans" in The Encyclopedia of Northern Kentucky, Paul A. Tenkotte and James C. Claypool, eds. (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 2009), 39. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, p. 196. “Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 303-308.
